0.3.name: wordpress/wp-social-links
0.3.description:
Hook into any custom post type or user and allow the ability to add links to various online profiles and pages. Great for company profiles, radio or TV programs, post author pages, and more!

Plugin Documentation

Documentation at http://www.bundy.ca/wp-social-links

Social media icons by IconDock
